mapper.select: SELECT MO.OUT_CODE AS "outCode", MO.PDETAIL_CODE AS "pDetailCode", MO.LOT_NO AS "lotNo", MO.MT_CODE AS "materialCode", MT.MT_NAME AS "materialName", MO.MT_OUT_COUNT AS "outgoingQuantity", MO.OUT_DATE AS "outDate" FROM MT_OUT MO JOIN MT MT ON MO.MT_CODE = MT.MT_CODE ORDER BY MO.LOT_NO
